script: Imagine you're teaching a robot to write a story. Traditional methods use simple word patterns, like filling in the blanks. But large language models, or LLMs, are like super-smart students who’ve read millions of books! They learn from vast amounts of text, predicting what comes next—like finishing your sentence before you do. Why does this matter? LLMs power chatbots, translate languages, and even help write code. They’re revolutionizing how machines understand and generate human-like text, making AI smarter and more useful every day!
